entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mildred Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
